attributes.action: We plead that the government declare a UK National day of Prayer for COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details:
We need to pray for God's mercy, healing and protection as a nation from this Coronavirus pandemic, so that the lives of our loved ones will be saved and stopped from dying helplessly. 
We need to pray for God to grant wisdom to our Scientists to discover a vaccine or cure to this pandemic.
A day preferably a Sunday can be set aside and one of our Pastors can pray with some of our leaders on behalf of the UK.
attributes.background: We plead that the Office of the Prime Minister of UK declare a National day of Prayer amidst the Coronavirus pandemic that has claimed the lives of so many citizens. This is Biblical based on 2Chronicles 7:14. If we call on God as a nation, He will hear us, forgive our sins and heal our land.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
